ca.concordia.controller

Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.concordia.controller.GameController

  • public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
    Context of the State pattern. It contains a State object (in this example the State class is the class Phase).

    • Method Detail

      • setPhase

        public void setPhase(Phase p_phase)
        Method that allows the GameEngine object to change its state.
        Parameters:
        p_phase - new state to be set for the GameEngine object.

      • start

        public void start()
        This method will ask the user: 1. What part of the game they want to start with (edit map or play game). Depending on the choice, the state will be set to a different object, which will set different behavior. 2. What command they want to execute from the game. Depending on the state of the GameEngine, each command will potentially have a different behavior.
